channel.title: Comments on: BLAERG, “New Era” coming September 3rd
channel.description: Independent Record Label - Ambient / Post-industrial / Neoclassical

item.title: By: shanesemler
item.dc:creator: shanesemler
item.description: Very abstract yet musical. Creating something like this without it falling apart into irritating noise is difficult. I think it walks that line really well. Very cool. Love that album art too!
item.content:encoded: Very abstract yet musical. Creating something like this without it falling apart into irritating noise is difficult. I think it walks that line really well. Very cool. Love that album art too!
